p: Hence, if ambient conditions (RSDS, TAS and VWS) correspond to the STCs, PVpot equals 1 and PV power production reaches the rated value. If they are so that T cell is higher (lower) than 25 °C and/or RSDS lower (higher) than 1,000 W m −2, PVpot will be lower (higher) than the unit and the PV power output will be lower (higher) than the nominal power of the module.
